tables.table_schema:
CREATE TABLE IF NOT EXISTS robotic_farm_equipment_schedule (
    id SERIAL PRIMARY KEY,
    equipment_name VARCHAR(50) NOT NULL,
    task_name VARCHAR(100) NOT NULL,
    task_status ENUM('Pending', 'Completed', 'Failed') NOT NULL,
    scheduled_time TIMESTAMP NOT NULL
);

CREATE TABLE schedule (
    id INT PRIMARY KEY,
    equipment_id INT,
    task_id INT,
    start_time TIMESTAMP,
    end_time TIMESTAMP
);

CREATE TABLE tasks (
    task_id INT PRIMARY KEY,
    task_name VARCHAR(255),
    task_description TEXT,
    difficulty_level INT,
    estimated_duration INT
);

CREATE TABLE Task (
  id INT PRIMARY KEY,
  description TEXT NOT NULL,
  status VARCHAR(20) DEFAULT 'Pending',
  robot_id INT,
  FOREIGN KEY (robot_id) REFERENCES Robot(id)
);

CREATE TABLE Schedule (
  id INT PRIMARY KEY,
  date DATE NOT NULL,
  time TIME NOT NULL,
  task_id INT,
  FOREIGN KEY (task_id) REFERENCES Task(id)
);

CREATE TABLE schedule (id SERIAL PRIMARY KEY,
               task_name TEXT NOT NULL,
               task_description TEXT,
               equipment_id INT NOT NULL,
               start_time TIMESTAMP NOT NULL,
               end_time TIMESTAMP NOT NULL);

CREATE TABLE tasks (id SERIAL PRIMARY KEY,
           task_name TEXT NOT NULL,
           task_description TEXT,
           duration INT,
           equipment_id INT NOT NULL);

CREATE TABLE equipment (id SERIAL PRIMARY KEY,
               name TEXT NOT NULL,
               type TEXT NOT NULL,
               last_maintenance_date DATE,
               status TEXT NOT NULL);

CREATE TABLE farm_areas (id SERIAL PRIMARY KEY,
               area_name TEXT NOT NULL,
               location TEXT,
               size FLOAT,
               soil_type TEXT);

CREATE TABLE farm_employees (id SERIAL PRIMARY KEY,
                  name TEXT NOT NULL,
                  role TEXT NOT NULL,
                  contact_number TEXT,
                  hire_date DATE);
